018package org.opengis.metadata.spatial;
019
020import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
021import org.opengis.annotation.Classifier;
022import org.opengis.annotation.Stereotype;
023import org.opengis.metadata.maintenance.Scope;
024
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
026import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.OPTIONAL;
027
028
029/**
030 * Digital mechanism used to represent spatial information.
031 *
032 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD, Geomatys)
033 * @version 3.1
034 * @since   2.0
035 */
036@Classifier(Stereotype.ABSTRACT)
037@UML(identifier="MD_SpatialRepresentation", specification=ISO_19115)
038public interface SpatialRepresentation {
039    /**
040     * Level and extent of the spatial representation.
041     *
042     * @return level and extent of the spatial representation, or {@code null} if none.
043     *
044     * @since 3.1
045     */
046    @UML(identifier="scope", obligation=OPTIONAL, specification=ISO_19115, version=2018)
047    default Scope getScope() {
048        return null;
049    }
050}
